roleset.name: emit light, sparkle
roleset.note: SPARKLE-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick based on frame file for 'shimmer'. Member of VNcls light_emission-43.1. (from sparkle.01-v)

example.name: sparkle
example.text: From a distance the T and C Tower sparkles in the southern Taiwan sunshine.

example.name: adjectival
example.text: Thick and viscous crude oil blackens the once sparkling wilderness.
